content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. As a landlord, I am always looking for a fair and reasonable rental price that will benefit both parties. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 800 Euros per month.

Please let me know the rental price you propose.

Thanks

Juan
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Juan. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a monthly rental price of 900 Euros. This price takes into account the costs of utilities and other expenses that the tenant will be responsible for. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I am confident that it will be within your budget. What do you think about this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate. Can we agree on a lower price?

Thanks

Juan
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I am always open to negotiation and finding a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on your budget and the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to consider a lower rental price. What is your ideal rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
